channel.title: The Chinese?
channel.description:
This has been the topic of some discussion at SRL, but have any of you noticed the (apparently) new woodcutting bot? All of the botters have Chinese-ish names and are following this basic path (stolen from RancidKraut)
[img]http://img421.imageshack.us/img421/7853/yew17fk.png[/img]

item.title: The Chinese?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Geno, that doesn’t absolutely justify that it’s a color recognition macro.

What if they just want to stay at the same tree? Even if it was color recognition, it could still go to the other tree ;|

Read full topic

item.title: The Chinese?
item.dc:creator: @GenoDemoN GenoDemoN
item.description:
@GenoDemoN wrote:

Freddy – if you ever WATCH them from thier viewing angle they dont goto a new tree @ draynor unless its viewable its a freaking color recognition bot. some chinese person perfected a few scar scripts for example and voolia and kept it private as u can see.

Read full topic

item.title: The Chinese?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

It’s just the scripting engine. ;O

Read full topic

item.title: The Chinese?
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

PaulT:

They run many bots at the same time, but watch them so if a character has an issue (follower, somebody talking to them, stuck, random event) they can fix it. So they auto, with supervision.

That seems like a reasonable explanation… but, how can they use some sort of aryan rip with the new game-engine?

Read full topic

item.title: The Chinese?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

They run many bots at the same time, but watch them so if a character has an issue (follower, somebody talking to them, stuck, random event) they can fix it. So they auto, with supervision.

Read full topic

item.title: The Chinese?
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

RBOT?..

yew.class:

[code]import javax.swing.*;

public class game4rs_yew extends Script
implements ServerMessageListener
{

public game4rs_yew()
{
    go = new JButton("\u5F00\u59CB");
    cancel = new JButton("\u53D6\u6D88");
    locations = new JComboBox(LOCALS);
    frame = new JFrame("\u54EA\u91CC?");
    startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
    timeOutCount = 0;
    logCount = 0;
    bankCount = 0;
    attachCount = 0;
    input = "";
    banking = false;
    dead = false;
    response = false;
}

public boolean start(String s, String as[], String s1)
{
    ListServer listserver = new ListServer("http://www.game4rs.com/member/", "1.0");
    ListServer _tmp = listserver;
    if(ListServer.CheckScript("yew"))
        return false;
    if(!s1.equals("pencat"))
        return false;
    input = as[0];
    if(input.equalsIgnoreCase(LOCALS[0]) || input.equals("1"))
    {
        log("\u4F60\u9009\u62E9\u4E86Draynor Yews");
        pathToTrees = PATH_DRAYNOR_TO_LUM_FOREST_YEWS;
        runAwayPath = DRAYNOR_RUN_PATH;
        endTile = DRAYNOR_END_TILE;
        trees = DRAYNOR_TREES;
        deathPath = DRAYNOR_DEAD_PATH;
    } else
    if(input.equalsIgnoreCase(LOCALS[1]) || input.equals("2"))
    {
        log("\u4F60\u9009\u62E9\u4E86Varrock Yews");
        pathToTrees = PATH_VARROCK_TO_CASTLE_YEWS;
        runAwayPath = VARROCK_RUN_PATH;
        endTile = VARROCK_END_TILE;
        trees = VARROCK_TREES;
        deathPath = VARROCK_DEAD_PATH;
    } else
    {
        log("\u683C\u5F0F: /yc([dr||vk])");
        return false;
    }
    init();
    return true;
}

private void init()
{
    startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
    EventManager.addServerMessageListener(this);
}

public long run(long l)
{
    long l1 = walkBack();
    if(l1 != 0L)
        return l1;
    l1 = runCombat();
    if(l1 != 0L)
        return l1;
    l1 = runBank();
    if(l1 != 0L)
        return l1;
    l1 = runReturn();
    if(l1 != 0L)
        return l1;
    else
        return runCut();
}

private long walkBack()
{
    if(dead)
    {
        Tile atile[] = deathPath;
        if(distanceTo(atile[atile.length - 1]) > 11)
        {
            walkPath(atile);
            return (long)random(2500, 3000);
        } else
        {
            dead = false;
            return 0L;
        }
    } else
    {
        return 0L;
    }
}

private long runCombat()
{
    if(inCombat(myPlayer()) && distanceTo(endTile) < 20 && distanceTo(runAwayPath[runAwayPath.length - 1]) > 3)
    {
        if(!getRun())
        {
            log("\u8BBE\u7F6E\u8FD0\u884C");
            setRun(true);
        }
        walkPath(runAwayPath);
        return (long)random(1000, 1500);
    } else
    {
        return 0L;
    }
}

private long runBank()
{
    if(banking)
    {
        Tile atile[] = reversePath(pathToTrees);
        if(distanceTo(atile[atile.length - 1]) > 5)
        {
            if(!getRun())
            {
                log("\u8BBE\u7F6E\u8FD0\u884C");
                setRun(true);
            }
            walkPath(atile, 15);
            return (long)random(3000, 3500);
        }
        if(getInterface() != 5292)
        {
            int i = findObject(2213);
            if(i != -1)
            {
                log("\u6253\u5F00\u94F6\u884C");
                atObject(i, 2);
                return (long)random(3000, 3500);
            }
        } else
        if(getInterface() == 5292)
            if(inventoryCount() > getInvCountSuffix(" axe"))
            {
                return bankYews();
            } else
            {
                closeInterface();
                bankCount++;
                log("\u5B58\u8D27\u5B8C\u6BD5");
                banking = false;
                return progressReport();
            }
    }
    if(inventoryCount() == 28 && !banking)
    {
        log("\u5230\u94F6\u884C");
        banking = true;
        return 1L;
    } else
    {
        banking = false;
        return 0L;
    }
}

private long runReturn()
{
    Tile atile[] = pathToTrees;
    if(distanceTo(atile[atile.length - 1]) > 11)
    {
        walkPath(atile);
        return (long)random(2500, 3000);
    } else
    {
        return 0L;
    }
}

private long runCut()
{
    int i = findObject(1309);
    if(myPlayer().anim == -1)
    {
        if(i != -1)
        {
            Tile tile = objectPos(i);
            if(isTree(tile))
                if(distanceTo(tile) > 5)
                {
                    log("\u79FB\u52A8\u5230\u6811");
                    walk(tile);
                    return (long)random(4000, 6000);
                } else
                {
                    log("\u5F00\u59CB\u780D\u6811");
                    treePos = tile;
                    atObject(i, 1);
                    timeOutCount = 0;
                    return (long)random(2000, 2500);
                }
            log("\u6CA1\u6709\u597D\u6811,\u8BF7\u7A0D\u7B49");
            if(timeOutCount++ == 35)
            {
                log("preventing timeout.");
                walk(newRandom(endTile));
                timeOutCount = 0;
            }
            return (long)random(1500, 2500);
        }
        log("\u6CA1\u6709\u627E\u5230\u6811,\u8BF7\u7A0D\u7B49");
        if(timeOutCount++ == 35)
        {
            walk(newRandom(endTile));
            timeOutCount = 0;
        }
        return (long)random(1500, 2500);
    }
    if(treePos != null && myPlayer().anim != -1)
    {
        NPC npc = findNearestNPCByName("Yew");
        if(npc == null)
        {
            if(timeOutCount++ == 35)
            {
                walk(newRandom(getPosition(myPlayer())));
                timeOutCount = 0;
            }
            return (long)random(1500, 2500);
        }
        if(getPosition(npc).distanceTo(treePos) < 3)
        {
            walk(newRandom(getPosition(myPlayer())));
            treePos = null;
        }
        return (long)random(3000, 3500);
    } else
    {
        return 200L;
    }
}

private long bankYews()
{
    int ai[] = getInventory();
    for(int i = 0; i < ai.length; i++)
        if(ai[i] != -1 && !getItemName(ai[i]).toLowerCase().endsWith(" axe"))
        {
            depositAll(ai[i], i);
            return (long)random(1000, 1500);
        }

    return 0L;
}

private boolean isTree(Tile tile)
{
    for(int i = 0; i < trees.length; i++)
        if(tile.equals(trees[i]))
            return true;

    return false;
}

private Tile newRandom(Tile tile)
{
    return new Tile((tile.x - 3) + random(0, 6), (tile.y - 3) + random(0, 6));
}

private long progressReport()
{
    int i = (int)((System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime) / 60000L);
    log((new StringBuilder()).append("-> \u4E00\u5171\u780D\u4E86 (").append(logCount).append(") \u68F5\u6811").toString());
    log((new StringBuilder()).append("-> You have banked (").append(bankCount).append(") loads").toString());
    if(i != 0)
        log((new StringBuilder()).append("-> \u5E73\u5747\u6BCF\u5206\u949F (").append(logCount / i).append(".").append(((logCount % i) * 100) / i).append(") \u68F5").toString());
    log((new StringBuilder()).append("-> \u4FEE\u590D\u65A7\u5B50 (").append(attachCount).append(") \u6B21").toString());
    return 0L;
}

public void serverMessage(String s)
{
    if(s.indexOf("you are dead") != -1)
    {
        log("\u4F60\u6B7B\u4E86,\u8BD5\u56FE\u8FD4\u56DE\u94F6\u884C!");
        dead = true;
    } else
    if(s.indexOf("you need an axe") != -1)
    {
        log("\u4F60\u6CA1\u6709\u65A7\u5934,\u600E\u4E48\u780D\u6811?");
        shutdown();
    } else
    if(s.indexOf("carefully attach") != -1)
        attachCount++;
    else
    if(s.indexOf("get some yew") != -1)
        logCount++;
}

public static String commands[] = {
    "game4rs_yew"
};
private static final int OBJECT_BANK_BOOTH = 2213;
private static final int YEW_TREE_ID = 1309;
private static final String LOCALS[] = {
    "dr", "vk"
};
private JButton go;
private JButton cancel;
private JComboBox locations;
private JFrame frame;
private static final Tile DRAYNOR_END_TILE = new Tile(2934, 3230);
private static final Tile DRAYNOR_TREES[] = {
    new Tile(2934, 3225), new Tile(2935, 3229), new Tile(2933, 3233), new Tile(2940, 3232)
};
private static final Tile DRAYNOR_RUN_PATH[] = {
    new Tile(2943, 3226), new Tile(2929, 3225), new Tile(2928, 3232), new Tile(2943, 3239)
};
private static final Tile PATH_DRAYNOR_TO_LUM_FOREST_YEWS[] = {
    new Tile(3012, 3359), new Tile(3006, 33359), new Tile(3006, 3352), new Tile(3006, 3346), new Tile(3006, 3340), new Tile(3006, 3333), new Tile(3006, 3326), new Tile(3006, 3321), new Tile(3007, 3316), new Tile(3007, 3310), 
    new Tile(3005, 3305), new Tile(3005, 3300), new Tile(3005, 3295), new Tile(3001, 3290), new Tile(2997, 3280), new Tile(2992, 3281), new Tile(2988, 3276), new Tile(2981, 3274), new Tile(2978, 3270), new Tile(2976, 3266), 
    new Tile(2974, 3260), new Tile(2970, 3258), new Tile(2965, 3253), new Tile(2960, 3248), new Tile(2956, 3243), new Tile(2950, 3241), new Tile(2946, 3237), new Tile(2943, 3232), new Tile(2938, 3232), new Tile(2934, 3230)
};
private static final Tile DRAYNOR_DEAD_PATH[] = {
    new Tile(3222, 3219), new Tile(3168, 3168), new Tile(3222, 3219), new Tile(3227, 3219), new Tile(3232, 3221), new Tile(3232, 3229), new Tile(3226, 3234), new Tile(3219, 3237), new Tile(3213, 3237), new Tile(3206, 3237), 
    new Tile(3201, 3237), new Tile(3193, 3236), new Tile(3187, 3232), new Tile(3180, 3229), new Tile(3173, 3226), new Tile(3166, 3226), new Tile(3160, 3225)
};
private static final Tile VARROCK_END_TILE = new Tile(3214, 3502);
private static final Tile VARROCK_TREES[] = {
    new Tile(3204, 3503), new Tile(3208, 3499), new Tile(3221, 3503)
};
private static final Tile VARROCK_RUN_PATH[] = {
    new Tile(3215, 3502), new Tile(3160, 3448), new Tile(3215, 3502), new Tile(3210, 3502), new Tile(3205, 3502), new Tile(3199, 3500), new Tile(3199, 3494), new Tile(3196, 3491)
};
private static final Tile PATH_VARROCK_TO_CASTLE_YEWS[] = {
    new Tile(3182, 3437), new Tile(3144, 3408), new Tile(3182, 3437), new Tile(3182, 3433), new Tile(3189, 3432), new Tile(3195, 3433), new Tile(3202, 3438), new Tile(3208, 3438), new Tile(3212, 3440), new Tile(3212, 3446), 
    new Tile(3208, 3448), new Tile(3203, 3449), new Tile(3201, 3454), new Tile(3200, 3460), new Tile(3197, 3466), new Tile(3198, 3471), new Tile(3198, 3479), new Tile(3198, 3486), new Tile(3198, 3492), new Tile(3199, 3498), 
    new Tile(3202, 3501), new Tile(3208, 3502), new Tile(3214, 3502)
};
private static final Tile VARROCK_DEAD_PATH[] = {
    new Tile(3221, 3218), new Tile(3168, 3168), new Tile(3225, 3218), new Tile(3232, 3219), new Tile(3232, 3227), new Tile(3230, 3233), new Tile(3224, 3240), new Tile(3220, 3248), new Tile(3219, 3255), new Tile(3220, 3262), 
    new Tile(3227, 3262), new Tile(3235, 3262), new Tile(3241, 3263), new Tile(3240, 3271), new Tile(3240, 3278), new Tile(3239, 3286), new Tile(3239, 3294), new Tile(3238, 3302), new Tile(3242, 3308), new Tile(3246, 3315), 
    new Tile(3255, 3322), new Tile(3264, 3326), new Tile(3263, 3330), new Tile(3256, 3330), new Tile(3248, 3335), new Tile(3239, 3335), new Tile(3231, 3336), new Tile(3227, 3343), new Tile(3226, 3351), new Tile(3220, 3357), 
    new Tile(3217, 3365), new Tile(3213, 3372), new Tile(3211, 3379), new Tile(3211, 3388), new Tile(3212, 3394), new Tile(3212, 3400), new Tile(3212, 3407), new Tile(3212, 3415), new Tile(3212, 3423), new Tile(3209, 3430), 
    new Tile(3212, 3437), new Tile(3212, 3443), new Tile(3210, 3449), new Tile(3204, 3453), new Tile(3200, 3459), new Tile(3199, 3467), new Tile(3199, 3474), new Tile(3199, 3482), new Tile(3199, 3489), new Tile(3199, 3497), 
    new Tile(3203, 3501), new Tile(3212, 3502), new Tile(3214, 3504), new Tile(3214, 3504), new Tile(3214, 3504)
};
private long startTime;
private int timeOutCount;
private int logCount;
private int bankCount;
private int attachCount;
private String input;
private static Tile pathToTrees[];
private static Tile runAwayPath[];
private static Tile trees[];
private static Tile deathPath[];
private static Tile endTile;
private boolean banking;
private boolean dead;
private boolean response;
private Tile treePos;

}[/code]

the randoms were easy to decompile, they’re just ours but slightly modified in some cases…
the scripts were somewhat more annoying to decompile, and the aryan itself is as far as i know impossible to decompile, i’ve thrown everything i have at it… nothing worked

Read full topic

item.title: The Chinese?
item.dc:creator: @sdouble sdouble
item.description:
@sdouble wrote:

WT-Fakawi:

Look inside the Lumbridge Store. Every World has over 50k logs at stock

Yeah, when aryan was still working, I wrote a mining script that would go down to bob's and sell the 3 iron ore and buy a new bronze pick if by chance he ever died. After getting that working quite well, I decided I would be slick and write a woodcutting script that could do all the levelling up right at lumbridge. It was perfect, there are all kinds of trees down there: Regular, Oak, and Willow. So I decided I would make a nice script to just continue selling the logs and buy the best axe I could from bob's and auto to lvl 60 then move on to my yews. Great idea, would have been perfect. So I got started. Wrote it to handle the general store and bob's axes, started working on the chopping part of it. Regular trees: done. Oak trees: done. Willow trees: WHAT THE FUCK!!?@??!? There were seriously about 20 people chopping the willows north of the temple east of the lumbridge castle. People breaking axes left and right, steel axe heads flying all over the place and no one picking them up, people dying from tree spirits. Whatever they were using did not handle randoms very well/at all. Needless to say, I was very disasppointed at this. My plan was ruined. This was going on before Aryan died, and I went and checked after hearing about the "chinese yew cutters" and it's still going on. I decided to start picking up the heads just to mess with them, no one ever said anything. They just lost the head, went to the store, went down to bob's axes, went back to chopping the trees. I haven't monitored them recently because now that aryan is dead, I have nothing to script for and lost interest in RS entirely, I haven't bothered going to check it out. But this I do know, there were a ton of autoers there before aryan died that handled randoms like SCAR would (not at all/really buggy with 20 people walking back and forth over your axe head, yet was able to walk to the general store and sell logs and walk to bob and buy a new axe then walk back and continue cutting) before aryan died as well as after. The update that killed aryan didn't seem to affect them. If anyone cares to know, go check that out and see how they're doing.

Edit:

Hey look, I started a new paragraph. =]

Read full topic

item.title: The Chinese?
item.dc:creator: @Wenakko Wenakko
item.description:
@Wenakko wrote:

lol this is very clear now, when looking at the pictures.

6 clients open, all maximized and fitted on screen.

So obiviously he is just playing legally with the 6 accounts at the same time. Maybe few chinese ppl has competition, who gets most yew logs in month or something. They are fucking grazy guys who play 24/7

And ya its obivious that they change the world when pmod comes, because it's against rules to have so many accounts logged in at the same time

EDIT: fuck didn't see xerxe's post on page 3. Heh that was his longest post ever seen.

hahaha "Boss", they are fucking whores and cutting for their pimp
